The palate boasts a weightless concentration, delivering bright red cherry, strawberry jelly, orange zest and licorice alongside taut, polished tannins. Bright acidity keeps it lifted and balanced, and a hazelnut note caps off the close. Drink 2024–2034. KERIN O’KEEFE

It's already compelling, but hold for even more complexity. Drink 2022–2036. KERIN O’KEEFE

It's still youthfully austere but already balanced, with firm acidity. Drink 2024–2041. KERIN O’KEEFE

It's already delicious and accessible but will also age well for years to come. Drink through 2035. KERIN O’KEEFE
